primary.name: Deep Ocean Blue
primary.description: The primary brand color, representing depth, stability, and trust. Used for key UI elements, headers, and interactive states.

secondary.name: Misty Seafoam
secondary.description: A calming secondary color, evoking clarity and openness. Used for accents, secondary buttons, and informational elements.

accent.name: Coral Sunset
accent.description: A vibrant accent color for calls to action and highlighting important information. Adds warmth and dynamism.

light.name: Cloud White
light.description: Primary background color. Provides a clean and spacious canvas.

medium.name: Stone Grey
medium.description: Used for borders, dividers, and disabled states.

dark.name: Charcoal Slate
dark.description: Used for primary text, dark backgrounds, and footer elements.
